sentences.english: Double-entry-accounting: A system of recording every business transaction with equal dollar amounts of both debit and credit entries.
sentences.chinese: 在借方和貸方用相等的金額記錄經濟事項的記賬系統。

sentences.english: She credited your account with the amount of the cheque.
sentences.chinese: 她把支票款項記入你的賬戶的貸方。

sentences.english: Equality of totals in the debit and credit sides of an account.
sentences.chinese: 對借方餘額和貸方餘額是否相等的驗證就叫做試算表。

sentences.english: Comparing debit and credit balances for equality.
sentences.chinese: 比較借方和貸方餘額是否相同。

sentences.english: If the revenue exceeds the expense, the Income Summary account will have a credit balance.
sentences.chinese: 如果收入超過費用，收益彙總帳戶就會有貸方餘額。

sentences.english: In a compound entry, all the credits are listed under the debits.
sentences.chinese: 在複合分錄中，所有貸方應列在借方之下。

sentences.english: A credit balance of $100 was brought forward from his June account.
sentences.chinese: 貸方餘額100美元是從他6月份的賬轉來的。

sentences.english: If you don't , the lender will foreclose on the home .
sentences.chinese: 如果你不，貸方將排除在回家。

sentences.english: The debtor and creditor must sign a document drawn up in accordance with government regulations.
sentences.chinese: 借方和貸方必須簽定一份依據政府規章草擬的文件。

sentences.english: Sum of debit entries minus the sum of credit entries in an account. If positive, the difference is called a debit balance;
sentences.chinese: 是指一個賬戶中貸方總額和借方總額的差額。

sentences.english: This proof of equality of debit and credit balances is called a trial balance.
sentences.chinese: 對借方餘額和貸方餘額是否相等的驗證就叫做試算表。
